articles.author: Majda Bouzaroita - Morocco World News
articles.title: Wave Goodbye to Google Podcasts App - Morocco World News
articles.description: Google has decided to shut down their Podcasts application, effective immediately in the  United States.  The tech giant has set a deadline for users to migrate their subscriptions to YouTube Music by April 2, TechCrunch reported.

articles.title: Gmail revolutionized email 20 years ago. People thought it was Google's April Fool's Day joke - KSL.com
articles.description: On April Fool's Day 2004, Google's founders launched Gmail, a free service boasting 1 gigabyte of storage per account — a preposterous amount of email capacity back then. But it was no joke.

articles.title: OpenAI makes ChatGPT's accessible without requiring sign ups - Reuters
articles.description: OpenAI will start allowing users to access its free-to-use ChatGPT generative AI chatbot without needing to sign up for the service beginning Monday, the Microsoft -backed startup said on Monday.
